word: IT WAS THIS SERIES OF STUDIES, ESPECIALLY THOSE THAT TOUCHED ON THE DIVISIVE SUBJECT OF THE LAW IN GALATIANS, THAT SPARKED THE CONTROVERSY THAT FOLLOWED. NO TRANSCRIPTION OF THE DISCUSSIONS WAS MADE, BUT THE SKETCHY NOTES OF ONE OR TWO DELEGATES, ELLEN WHITE'S RECORDS, AND THE RECOLLECTIONS OF MANY WHO WERE PRESENT REVEAL THE BITTERNESS OF THE CONTROVERSY AND THE BALEFUL EFFECTS OF THE NEGATIVE ATTITUDE OF SEVERAL PROMINENT CHURCH LEADERS.
